description: This dashboard is to display the metrics from windows bench

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$server", mode!="idle"}[30s])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$server"}[30s])))) * 100

panels.title: CPU Busy

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$server", mode="user"}[30s])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$server"}[30s])))
sum by(instance) (irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$server", mode="iowait"}[30s])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$server"}[30s])))

sum by(instance) (irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$server", mode=~".*irq"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$server"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$server", mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq'}[30s])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$server"}[30s])))

sum by(instance) (irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$server", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$server"}[30s])))

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

title: Windows Bench Metrics
